AI-Assisted CV Website

Learn to generate, customize & deploy your own résumé site

View Curriculum

Course Overview

Harness the power of AI prompts and Bootstrap 5 to rapidly scaffold a professional CV website. In this hands-on workshop you’ll generate semantic HTML/CSS with AI, refine layouts, add your content, and deploy via GitHub Pages or Netlify.

What You’ll Learn

Prompt Engineering

Write effective AI prompts to generate HTML skeletons.

Bootstrap 5 Layouts

Master the grid, utilities, and components for responsive design.

Styling & Theming

Customize colors, fonts, and spacing to match your brand.

Deploy & Host

Publish your site to GitHub Pages or Netlify in minutes.

Curriculum & Modules

Module 1: Introduction to AI-Powered Dev
  • • Overview of AI in front-end development
  • • Choosing the right AI assistant (ChatGPT, Codeium…)
  • • Crafting prompts that yield semantic HTML/CSS
Module 2: Bootstrap 5 Essentials
  • • Grid system & responsive breakpoints
  • • Navbar, cards, and utility classes
  • • Integrating AI-generated code with Bootstrap
Module 3: Content & Styling
  • • Populating sections: About, Experience, Skills
  • • Custom CSS overrides
  • • Accessibility & semantic markup
Module 4: Deployment
  • • Setting up a GitHub repo
  • • CI/CD with GitHub Actions or Netlify
  • • Custom domain & HTTPS

Who This Is For

Ideal for students, job-seekers, and hobbyists who want to leverage AI to speed up front-end projects.
